title: RA Sushi offers Spicy Shrimp Soup with specific ingredients
statement: RA Sushi serves Spicy Shrimp Soup with shrimp in spicy miso broth, tofu, green onions, mushrooms and spinach.

citations.quote: SPICY SHRIMP SOUP Shrimp simmered in a spicy miso broth with tofu, green onions, mushrooms and spinach
